title: Turok.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Turok.Repack-R.G.Mechanics


Year: 2008
Genre: Action / 3D / 1st Person
Publication Type: Repack
Game Language : Eng | Rus
Voice Language: Eng | Rus
Crack: FAiRLiGHT

System requirements:

Operating system: Windows XP (SP2), Windows Vista, Windows 7
Processor: Pentium  4 2,4 GHz / Athlon XP 2,4 GHz 64
Memory: 1 GB
Video: 128 MB memory, compatible with DirectX  9.0c (nVidia GeForce 6600, ATI Radeon X1300 or similar)
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX  9.0
Free space on hard disk: 14 GB

Description:

You want to visit a place of heroes Steven Spielberg "Jurassic Park"? 
The new part of the cult game series, Turok, designed specifically for 
video game systems, new generation - is definitely for you! While scientists 
speculate about the causes of extinction of the dinosaurs, the protagonist 
of the game, Special Forces commander Joseph Turk - exterminate them without 
hesitation! Predatory reptiles growth of fifteen feet, carnivorous plants 
and insects, giant ferns, impassable swamps and mountains - all this and 
more will see players traveling through a lost planet similar to Earth 
Jurassic period. All the dinosaurs have the instincts of real animals. 
They attack only when hungry or feel threatened and attacked not only 
the player, but also at each other! But not only the dinosaurs will 
confront the protagonist. Get ready for a meeting with the mercenaries 
terrorists barricaded in the jungle - they are great landmark, fast, 
smart and cruel ...

GameFeatures:

More than thirty kinds of dinosaurs actually existed
Virtual universe, changing in real time
Realistic graphics
The original combat system
Ability to play off opponents on each other

Repack Features: 

Cut multiplayer
Do not recoded
